title: Hero Characters Bundle
description: +13.9K phrases of 12 different male and female hero characters for FPS, MOBA, RPG, Action-Adventure, Survival, Horror, Shooter, RTS, Sandbox games and more.
longDescription:
[ REAL HUMAN VOICE ACTORS - NO AI USE ALLOWED ]


Ryan: Audio Preview | List of Phrases

Erik: Audio Preview | List of Phrases

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


This bundle includes the following packs:

Ryan - Hero Character Voice Pack

Erik - Hero Character Voice Pack

Arthur - British Hero Character Voice Pack

Justin - Teen Hero Character Voice Pack

Charlie - Child Hero Character Voice Pack


Ruby - Hero Character Voice Pack

Alex - Hero Character Voice Pack

Olivia - British Hero Character Voice Pack

Chloe - Teen Hero Character Voice Pack

Emily - Child Hero Character Voice Pack

Females Archer Warrior Voice Pack


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------


A large variety of male and female characters that covers everything you need for your next project.

That's 13,906 files TOTAL! 4 hours of sound!!

They can also be used as NPC characters.

These packs can be used for games such as: FPS, MOBA, RPG, Action-Adventure, Survival, Horror, Shooter, RTS, Sandbox games and more.

They can also be used for animation, videos, etc.

These unique royalty-free phrases were carefully mixed and mastered to match your project.


MAIN FEATURES:


  • 12 different voice packs in one bundle, a GREAT DEAL!
  • 13,906 files made from +900 unique phrases.
  • Authentic voice actors, not computer generated.
  • The packs are divided by categories for easy access.
  • Top quality voice recordings, each line carefully edited and mastered to sit perfectly in your mix.
  • All files are in high-quality WAV (16 Bit 44.1 kHz Mono) format, organized and ready to use!
  • Perfect for video games, animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.


CATEGORIES:


  • Positive-Confirm
  • Negative-Refuse
  • Can't
  • Threats-Warning
  • Greetings
  • Goodbyes
  • Questions
  • Single Word
  • Phrases
  • State
  • Requesting Help
  • Offering Help
  • Direction
  • Commands
  • Numbers
  • Time
  • Need
  • Trading
  • Curses
  • Fighter
  • Archer
  • Elf-Knight
  • Vocal Sounds
